definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: Oh dear, I'd been looking forward to warmer weather here.
sentences.chinese: 噢天啊，我原期望这儿会有较暖和的天气。

sentences.english: The old woman a maid servant to clean her house.
sentences.chinese: 老妇人雇佣了一个暖和的仆人去洗她的马。

sentences.english: Lying on the drafty floor of the airplane, there was no way to warm myself.
sentences.chinese: 躺在透风的飞机地板上，根本无法让身体暖和起来。

sentences.english: The girl  thawed her frozen hands in front of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 女孩在火边让冻僵的手暖和起来。

sentences.english: The afternoon grew a little warmer and the snow came thicker than ever.
sentences.chinese: 下午稍微变暖和了一点，雪却前所未有地更厚了。

sentences.english: He breathed on his hands to warm them up.
sentences.chinese: 他冲着手哈气，好暖和些。

sentences.english: The weatherman forecasts snow for tomorrow, so bring a warm jacket.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报员预报明天有雪，所以带件暖和的外套吧。

sentences.english: If taken into a warm room , ice will gradually disappear and change into water.
sentences.chinese: 如果冰被拿进暖和的房间，就会慢慢地变成水。

sentences.english: We have wran days and cool nights in early spring and late autumn.
sentences.chinese: 新奥尔良的初春和晚秋白天暖和，夜间凉爽。

sentences.english: Hiemal moment relies on sunshine to be able to become very warm and downy.
sentences.chinese: 冬季的时候靠阳光就可以变得非常暖和而柔和。

sentences.english: Alcohol dehydrates the body and makes you feel warmer than you actually are.
sentences.chinese: 酒精让你的身体缺水，让你觉得身体更暖和些。

sentences.english: This is a warm blanket, not like that thin one.
sentences.chinese: 这条毯子暖和，不像那条薄的。

sentences.english: Tomorrow will be warm and sunny .
sentences.chinese: 明天即暖和又阳光充足。

sentences.english: It's pretty cold in San Francisco, warm here.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山挺冷，但是这里很暖和。

sentences.english: We start on about global warming and the environment again.
sentences.chinese: 我们又开始讨论起全球变暖和环境。

definition: to stay warm/to protect against the cold
Nuannuan district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
